1.title: Маркетолог

2.title: Head of Sales and Marketing
2.job_description:
[
Привет!Меня зовут Настя, и я HR-директор компании Live Animations.Live Animations — международная IT-компания с офисами в США и Украине. Специализируемся на разработке инновационных маркетинговых решений с дополненной реальностью (AR) для детских и семейных брендов. За 6 лет мы реализовали более 30 проектов для компаний из 54 стран мира. Наши приложения скачали более 12 миллионов раз и было зафиксировано 137 миллионов взаимодействий с аудиторией.Сейчас мы ищем в команду Руководителя коммерческого отделения (В2В).Из основных обязанностей:• проводить встречи и переговоры, заключать контракты с новыми клиентами (на английском и русском языке);• разрабатывать и внедрять технологии продаж;• разрабатывать маркетинговую стратегию продвижения на рынке;• координировать маркетинговые активности (запуск рекламы, контроль рассылок и тд) .Ты наш идеальный кандидат, если:• у тебя есть опыт работы руководителем отдела продаж и/или маркетинга от 2-х лет; • у тебя есть опыт работы в сфере В2В продаж/маркетинга от 5-и лет;• твой уровень английского — свободный (Fluent).• у тебя есть опыт ведения переговоров с крупными клиентам в сегменте В2В;• у тебя отличные коммуникационные навыки, ты умеешь руководить командой и быть лидером.Уверен в себе? Отправь нам свое резюме на почту [відгукнутися] или звони по телефону 
Показати телефон.До встречи!Искренне твоя, НастяHR-директорLive Animations
]

3.title: Бренд-менеджер

4.title: Online Marketing Specialist
4.job_description:
[
We are hiring for our customer TrainingMeals.TrainingMeals wants to change the way sports enthusiasts eat. It is a newly found venture out of NY city. It‘s founder created multiple food businesses in the US prior and is a vivid sport enthusiast himself.About the job:We are looking for a data-savvy Marketing Analyst to join our Growth team, whose objective will be to support the fast and sustainable growth of the TrainingMeals business in the United States. You will support and drive marketing campaigns with actionable, relevant insights derived from rigorous quantitative analysis. The ideal candidate is curious, analytical, and obsessive about delivering measurable results.The position will be full-time, and based from our Lviv office. The role acts as the digital marketing lead USA, with direct support from the Media Agency.Your responsibilities:
Design, implement and actively manage user acquisition campaigns across Google AdWords, Bing Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube and other platforms with the goal of growing leads and maximizing ROI.
Set goals, KPIs and report on results.
Continuously optimize campaigns through performance analysis, ad copy testing, quality score improvement, keyword management and landing page testing.
Standardize A/B testing & own road map development across, as well as campaign analyses across performance marketing channels.
Design, build, and maintain tools and dashboards for data visualization.
Identify opportunities to test new campaign ideas.
Work closely with members of the Content Marketing team to build campaign assets.
Who we’re looking for:
3+ years of digital marketing experience with focus on lead generation and conversion.
Fluent in Google AdWords, Google Analytics. (certifications preferred).
At least 3 years of hands-on experience setting-up and optimizing programmatic display and video campaigns through various DSPs such as Google Display Network, AppNexus, Mediamath, Doubleclick, and/or other similar platforms.
Familiarity with ad server trafficking and campaign builds.
A deep knowledge of display and video optimization and a good understanding of customer funnels and attribution methods (multi-touch, first-touch, last-click, linear, data-driven, etc.).
Preferably, you have used Sisense (Periscope Data) or other relevant metrics dashboards to analyze data for meaningful optimization insights.
Knowledge of Marketing Automation software like Salesforce Pardot or HubSpot is a plus.
Self-starter with a strong drive to succeed, enthusiasm for a fast-paced, team-oriented environment with a willingness to learn and spearhead new channels.
An excellent level of written English is required.
What we offer:
Fast career development opportunities in a dynamic results-driven US organization.
Competitive compensation based on your qualifications and performance.
You’ll have the chance to push your ideas from inception to execution without being held back by bureaucracy.
A vibrant, international environment.
Flexible working hours and paid vacation & sick leave
Free German language course, with an option to relocate to Germany in the future.
Free local gym access or private healthcare.
Regular team events
Free coffee, tea and snacks
We are constantly working on improving our office environment and introducing new team member benefits. Give us your feedback what you would like to see here.

]

5.title: Market Research Analyst
5.job_description:
[
Kyivstar, part of Vimpelcom Group, extends the commercial analysis team.Main responsibilities will include: 
Lead multiple research projects on a day-to-day basis 
Identify opportunities for development of research process and making it valuable in strategic decision making 
Ensure implementation of the market research plan 
Manage briefing of internal clients, effective questionnaire design, data analysis, data visualization, report preparation and presentations to ensure objectives are met and meaningful insights are produced 
Interact on a frequent basis with internal clients and external research agencies 
Support procurement process ensuring strong financial discipline and accurate budgeting 
Provide ongoing internal clients support, including survey methodology, interpretation and analysis. 

Streamline comprehensive management reporting of findings and solutions from research deliverables in a concise and easy-to-understand manner 
Ideal candidate will meet following requirements: 
Higher Education in Social Science 
At least 3−4 years in research agency, Market Intelligence/Business Development/Strategic Planning/Research departments of telecom and/or FMCG companies 
Strong analytical and visualization skills, deep knowledge of statistical analysis 
Advanced English, PowerPoint and Excel, intermediate SPSS 
Responsible, strong negotiation, interpersonal, managerial and communication skills, people management 
Working at VEON demands a high standard of business ethics and adherence to our legal obligations, our values and our Code of Conduct and supporting compliance policies and procedures. Our pioneering spirit is embodied in our values to be customer obsessed, entrepreneurial, innovative, collaborative, and truthful. Being truthful requires us to act ethically, honestly, and with integrity.
]
